short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a button to delete half your tabs at random.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many times have you been faced with a bazillion tabs open at once? Remember the feeling of despair, helplessness, fear?

Well, no more! With TabTidy you can tidy up the browser with the click of a button.

TabTidy puts a small button in your browser toolbar, which you can click to close half your tabs at random. If that's still too much, click it again.

Have fun! :)
